original_title: 学校帰りに突然の雷雨で我が家に雨宿りしに来た娘とそのクラスメイト達。雨でビショ濡れになり透けた制服姿の彼女達にドキ！っとしてタジタジな私。
overview: My daughter and her classmates who came home soaked in the rain. And the self of the father who is embarrassed and fascinated by the bra that is transparent from the blouse. No! No! What are you going to do with your daughter's friend? Even though I thought that, the school girls teased me, the father of such a friend. Ultimately, am I guilty of following my male instincts?
title: A Girl and My Classmate Came Running After School to My House to Get Out of the Rain. Their Uniforms Were Dripping Wet and I Got Butterflies! And Excited.
